10578.quoteText: I. RED POCKET MOBILE SERVICE CANNOT BE USED FOR: (1) access to the Internet, intranets, or other data networks except as the device’s native applications and capabilities permit, or (2) any applications that tether your device to a laptop or personal computer other than for the use of Wireless Sync unless the terms of that particular service plan allow for mobile hotspot access, or (3) any other prohibited uses described herein.
10578.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

tosdr.case: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Service has a section titled "RED POCKET MOBILE SERVICE CANNOT BE USED FOR" outlining all the illegal activities, and more which are detrimental to others access to the service.

10579.quoteText: Users on our Unlimited Plan will notice reduced data speeds when data usage exceeds an average of 30GB during the current billing month.</p
10579.title: This service throttles your use

tosdr.tldr: Terms of Service bear the line "UNLIMITED DOES NOT MEAN UNREASONABLE USE" regarding all its services. Stating that "Users on our Unlimited Plan may notice reduced data speeds when data usage exceeds an average of 30GB during the current billing month."
